page.title: 12LOWER HOUSE FARM,EASTHAM
page.content: OUR NAMES ARE MICHAEL(44), JOSEPHINE (43),DAVID(18) AND NEIL(15)WARD.WE FARM 219 ACRES COMPRISING APPROXIMATELY 100 ACRES OF MIXED CEREALS, 100 ACRES OF GRASSLAND AND 19 ACRES OF FRUIT TREES. THE GRAIN IS SOLD FOR ANIMAL FEED WITH A SMALL AMOUNT RETAINED FOR FEEDING 40 BEEF CATTLE AND 500 BREEDING EWES DURING THE WINTER. THE GRASSLAND IS USED FOR GRAZING IN SUMMER AND HAY IS MADE FOR WINTER FEED. SEVERAL VARIETIES OF PLUMS ARE GROWN, EARLY PROLIFIC,YELLOW EGG PLUMS,PURPLE PERSHORE,OPAL,ARIEL,LAXTON CROPPER, BELLE_DE_VAIN,BERBANKS,WARWICKSHIRE DROOPERS,QUEEN'S CROWN, MARJORIE SEEDLINGS,GAGES AND CZARS.
